name: RádioRioSertanejo
0:
”Alexa, open country river radio”
”Alexa, play country river radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country river radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Father Josemar Galvão is the creator of the program and the RIO SERTANEJO application, with programming aimed at lovers of true country music, which transmits a lot of joy and interactivity to listeners, accompanied by a word of faith and hope.

Father Josemar Galvão is a priest trained by the Catholic Apostolic Charismatic Church-ICAC, ordained by Dom Euclides Nunes (In Memoriam). Exorcist priest who celebrates Masses of healing and liberation, always focused on helping the suffering, teaching the Word of God and leading the people to follow in the footsteps of Jesus Christ.

WE ARE TOGETHER AND GOD IS WITH US!


Disclaimer: Content in Portuguese

The radio content is only in Portuguese. We do not guarantee complete accuracy and are not responsible for misunderstandings. Interruptions may occur. Your understanding is your responsibility.
